If you are a server administrator/moderator, please change my permission overwrites on the aformentioned channel.
COMMANDS.SUPPORT_DESC: Mai is an open-source, developing bot. As the bot progresses, Mai is bound to produce undesirable errors that interferes with her functions, and therefore strains functionality. It is good to hear that you're interested in supporting mai, and there are various ways to do so..
COMMANDS.SUPPORT_FV1: Join with %MEMCOUNT% other people and participate in Mai's support server from development to production, test bots, report bugs, or add feature requests, and be updated on what's to come.
COMMANDS.SUPPORT_FV2: Found some bugs? Do you feel you can fix it yourself? Contribute to Mai's repository [here](https://github.com/maisans-maid/Mai) by creating an issue or making a reasonable pull request. While you're at it please follow Sakurajimai#6742 and/or add a star to the repository.
COMMANDS.SUPPORT_FV3: We are currently not receiving forms. We will update this message once we start receiving forms again. Thank you for your continued support.
COMMANDS.SUPPORT_FV4: As of the moment, there are only few dedicated collaborators for the production of Mai, and maintaining he bot has been done solely by Sakurajimai#6742. This is the reason why some fix updates take longer than anticipated. If you are confident and active enough to help maintain the code, you may [join](https://support.mai-san.ml) my support server and contact `Sakurajimai#6742` from there.
COMMANDS.SUPPORT_FV5: Mai is available both on [DiscordBotList](https://discordbotlist.com/bots/mai-3909) and [Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/702074452317307061). If you like this bot please vote and leave a review. Your review will be helpful when making changes to the bot. You also receive additional rewards when voting on top.gg.
COMMANDS.TIP_ALREADYGIVN: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, you already used your tip. You can wait for `%DURATION%` to tip someone again.
COMMANDS.TIP_NOMEMBER: \✔️ **%AUTHOR%**, you can now tip someone from this server!
COMMANDS.TIP_INVALIDMEM: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, the user you provided could not be found in this server!
COMMANDS.TIP_TIPPEDISSLF: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot give a tip to yourself!
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_NOMEM: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, please include the member you want your coins to transfer to.
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_INMEM: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, I couldn't find that member in this server!
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_BTMEM: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot transfer coins to a bot!
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_TSELF: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot transfer coins to yourself
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_YOUNG: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, you cannot transfer coins to an account which is less than 2 weeks old.
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_NOAMT: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, please specify the amount you like to transfer.
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_INAMT: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, **%AMOUNT%** is an invalid amount. Make sure the amount are all digit (remove all symbols, including commas, periods, and monetary signs)
COMMANDS.TRANSFER_INSUF: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, Insuffecient credits! You only have **%BANK%** in your bank! (10% fee applies)
COMMANDS.UNEQUIP_NOTYPE: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, Please select one of the following: %TYPES%
COMMANDS.UNWARN_NO_IDS: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, Please provide the ID(s) from the warning logs to remove.
COMMANDS.UNWARN_NO_ID_MA: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, None of the IDs provided match with the records.
COMMANDS.UPCOMING_NOTYPE: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, A media type must be supplied and must be one of the following: %TYPES%
COMMANDS.WARNINGS_NOWARN: This person has not been warned yet.
COMMANDS.WATCHING_NODATA: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, This server has no anischedule entries yet.
COMMANDS.WATCHING_NOCHAN: \❌ **%AUTHOR%**, This server's anischedule feature has been disabled.
COMMANDS.WATCHING_TIPS:
- Use [`%PREFIX%watch`](%WATCHURL%) to add subscription.
- Use [`%PREFIX%unwatch`](%UNWATCHURL%) to remove subscription.
- Use `%PREFIX%nextep <anime title>` to check episode countdown.

Vote **%CLIENT%** on **Top.gg** and receive additional rewards (x2 on weekends)
<%TOP_GG%>

Vote **%CLIENT%** on **DiscordBotList** here -> <%DBL%>

SYSTEM.CMD_ERROR: आपको यह संदेश नहीं मिलना चाहिए. इसे ठीक करने के लिए `Sakurajimai#6742` से संपर्क करें या <https://support.mai-san.ml/> पर समर्थन में शामिल हो
SYSTEM.COOLDOWN:
\❌**%AUTHOR%**, आप अभी तक इस आदेश का उपयोग नहीं कर सकते
कृपया फिर से इस आदेश का उपयोग करने से पहले `% TIME %` प्रतीक्षा करें!
SYSTEM.CHATBOT: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, चैटबॉट एपीआई से कनेक्ट करने की कोशिश में एक त्रुटि हुई है
SYSTEM.PERM_GUILDONLY: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, यह कमांड केवल सर्वर के अंदर ही इस्तेमाल किया जा सकता है
SYSTEM.PERM_OWNERONLY: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, यह कमांड केवल मेरे डेवलपर द्वारा उपयोग किया जा सकता है
SYSTEM.PERM_ADMINONLY: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, यह कमांड केवल सर्वर प्रशासक द्वारा उपयोग किया जा सकता है
SYSTEM.PERM_NSFW: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, आप केवल nsfw चैनल पर इस कमांड का उपयोग कर सकते हैं
SYSTEM.PERM_REQUIRESD: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, डेटाबेस से कनेक्ट करने में असमर्थ है। डेटाबेस जुड़ा नहीं है.
SYSTEM.PERM_DISCOUSER: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, इस क्रिया को करने के लिए आपके पास ये अनुमतियां होनी चाहिए: %PERMISSIONS%.
SYSTEM.PERM_DISCLIENT: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, इस क्रिया को करने में सक्षम होने के लिए मुझे निम्नलिखित अनुमति की आवश्यकता है: %PERMISSIONS%.
SYSTEM.PERM_GUILDPROF: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, इस सर्वर की प्रोफ़ाइल लाने में असमर्थ
SYSTEM.PERM_GUILDXPRC: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, इस सर्वर में XP सिस्टम को निष्क्रिय कर दिया गया है
SYSTEM.PERM_CHANNXPRC: \❌**%AUTHOR%**, इस चैनल में XP सिस्टम को निष्क्रिय कर दिया गया है
